effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.

short_effect.sword_shield: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.
